subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer and Novak Djokovic will face each other on Sunday at Wimbledon, just as their coaches, Stefan Edberg and Boris Becker, did in the ’80s and ’90s.
snippet: Roger Federer and Novak Djokovic will face each other on Sunday at Wimbledon, just as their coaches, Stefan Edberg and Boris Becker, did in the ’80s and ’90s.
